TopicTitle: XBOX EE, No Distance Markers for Targets

Articles.Content:
On Xbox EE, Cursor Control Sheme

 

Is it intended that you have no longer a distance highlight on a Vessel that you have set as Target?

 On the previous version you had a square highlight with distance to the Vessel that you have set as Target, even in the normal Vessel Focus view.

It makes the last part of Rendezvous harder.

Vessel tabs is what your thinking about. They're off by default , you can toggle it by pressing LB+ back button on xbox. 

And it's not just the targeted vessel , it will also show you flags /other vessels you have landed/in orbit. Hope this helps.
